title: PM condoles death of renowned lawyer S.M. Zafar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 19 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Thursday expressed grief over the death of renowned lawyer and former senator Syed Muhammad Zafar.
The prime minister prayed for the departed soul to rest in peace and for the grant of patience to the bereaved family.
S.M. Zafar passed away in Lahore on Thursday after a prolonged illness. He was 93.
